annotation_1.eng: Count together the colors of the rainbow.

annotation_2.eng: Have you ever seen a rainbow after it rains? Sometimes, you can even see a double rainbow if you're lucky!

annotation_3.eng: Point out that her dress and the background on this page go through many of the same colors as the rainbow.

rows.annotation_1: Count together the colors of the rainbow.
rows.annotation_2: Have you ever seen a rainbow after it rains? Sometimes, you can even see a double rainbow if you're lucky!
rows.annotation_3: Point out that her dress and the background on this page go through many of the same colors as the rainbow.

annotation_1.eng: How does the color red make you feel? Red is often thought of as an active, high energy color.

annotation_2.eng: Sometimes red is an angry color. People may say they "see red" when they are angry.

annotation_3.eng: People often paint things red or choose red things because of the color's high energy. Have you seen cars that are red?

rows.annotation_1: How does the color red make you feel? Red is often thought of as an active, high energy color.
rows.annotation_2: Sometimes red is an angry color. People may say they "see red" when they are angry.
rows.annotation_3: People often paint things red or choose red things because of the color's high energy. Have you seen cars that are red?

rows.story_text: Kewyu is wearing a red shirt.

story_text.eng: Kewyu is wearing a red shirt.

annotation_1.eng: Do you have any red clothes?

annotation_2.eng: Do you have any red flowers near where you live?

annotation_3.eng: Count together the number of people in this picture.

rows.annotation_1: Do you have any red clothes?
rows.annotation_2: Do you have any red flowers near where you live?
rows.annotation_3: Count together the number of people in this picture.

annotation_1.eng: How does orange feel compared to red? It is still high energy, but perhaps a bit less so.

annotation_2.eng: She looks all alone in the middle of all that orange with her hands stretched out like that.

annotation_3.eng: An orange is a fruit named after its color. Can you think of other orange things around you?

rows.annotation_1: How does orange feel compared to red? It is still high energy, but perhaps a bit less so.
rows.annotation_2: She looks all alone in the middle of all that orange with her hands stretched out like that.
rows.annotation_3: An orange is a fruit named after its color. Can you think of other orange things around you?

rows.story_text: This is an orange. What else can you see that is the color orange?

story_text.eng: This is an orange. What else can you see that is the color orange?

annotation_1.eng: The cat and fish are orange. Have you seen an orange cat or fish before?

annotation_2.eng: A sphere is a ball -- round in all directions. Is an orange a sphere?

annotation_3.eng: How is the fish bowl different from a sphere?

rows.annotation_1: The cat and fish are orange. Have you seen an orange cat or fish before?
rows.annotation_2: A sphere is a ball -- round in all directions. Is an orange a sphere?
rows.annotation_3: How is the fish bowl different from a sphere?

annotation_1.eng: Make up something that she is pointing at.

annotation_2.eng: She looks excited about what is coming next. I bet it is something yellow!

annotation_3.eng: How has her dress changed from earlier pictures? Hint: It is now broken up into two sections.

rows.annotation_1: Make up something that she is pointing at.
rows.annotation_2: She looks excited about what is coming next. I bet it is something yellow!
rows.annotation_3: How has her dress changed from earlier pictures? Hint: It is now broken up into two sections.

rows.story_text: The yolk of an egg is yellow. What else can you see that is the color yellow?

story_text.eng: The yolk of an egg is yellow. What else can you see that is the color yellow?

annotation_1.eng: How can you tell that she is hungry?

annotation_2.eng: She has a yellow sunflower on her table. Do you have flowers around you sometimes when you eat?

annotation_3.eng: Name something in the sky that is yellow.

rows.annotation_1: How can you tell that she is hungry?
rows.annotation_2: She has a yellow sunflower on her table. Do you have flowers around you sometimes when you eat?
rows.annotation_3: Name something in the sky that is yellow.

annotation_1.eng: How does green feel to you? This green is a lot calmer than the red, orange, or yellow.

annotation_2.eng: Name some things that are green -- they are all around you!

annotation_3.eng: Green comes in many different types. How many types of green can you name?

rows.annotation_1: How does green feel to you? This green is a lot calmer than the red, orange, or yellow.
rows.annotation_2: Name some things that are green -- they are all around you!
rows.annotation_3: Green comes in many different types. How many types of green can you name?

annotation_1.eng: Point at and count the animals you see on this page -- look carefully!

annotation_2.eng: Point out the yellow greens, lime greens, bright greens, and dark greens on this page.

annotation_3.eng: A lot of trees are brown and green. Brown is not one of the main colors of the rainbow. Where does it show up in the rainbow?

rows.annotation_1: Point at and count the animals you see on this page -- look carefully!
rows.annotation_2: Point out the yellow greens, lime greens, bright greens, and dark greens on this page.
rows.annotation_3: A lot of trees are brown and green. Brown is not one of the main colors of the rainbow. Where does it show up in the rainbow?

annotation_1.eng: She looks so happy in the middle of all that blue. Does blue make you feel happy?

annotation_2.eng: Some people say they feel blue when they are sad. Does blue seem like a sad color to you?

annotation_3.eng: The sky and water are usually blue, but it is not common in plants. Have you seen flowers that are blue?

rows.annotation_1: She looks so happy in the middle of all that blue. Does blue make you feel happy?
rows.annotation_2: Some people say they feel blue when they are sad. Does blue seem like a sad color to you?
rows.annotation_3: The sky and water are usually blue, but it is not common in plants. Have you seen flowers that are blue?

annotation_1.eng: Bodies of water, such as oceans, seas, lakes, and rivers, are often blue.

annotation_2.eng: Point to these birds and clouds and count them together.

annotation_3.eng: Which are there more of -- clouds or birds?

rows.annotation_1: Bodies of water, such as oceans, seas, lakes, and rivers, are often blue.
rows.annotation_2: Point to these birds and clouds and count them together.
rows.annotation_3: Which are there more of -- clouds or birds?

annotation_1.eng: Flowers are sometimes indigo. Have you seen flowers whose color is close to being indigo?

annotation_2.eng: Sometimes her hands are stretched out wide. Having hands on hips often shows defiance and strength.

annotation_3.eng: Indigo is very powerful. How do you feel if you stare at this big square of indigo?

rows.annotation_1: Flowers are sometimes indigo. Have you seen flowers whose color is close to being indigo?
rows.annotation_2: Sometimes her hands are stretched out wide. Having hands on hips often shows defiance and strength.
rows.annotation_3: Indigo is very powerful. How do you feel if you stare at this big square of indigo?

rows.story_text: These berries are the color indigo.

story_text.eng: These berries are the color indigo.

annotation_1.eng: Count together the buttons or snaps on her jacket.

annotation_2.eng: Would you like to eat some of those berries? Do you think you could eat all of them?

annotation_3.eng: Think of the largest number you can. Does she have more berries than that number?

rows.annotation_1: Count together the buttons or snaps on her jacket.
rows.annotation_2: Would you like to eat some of those berries? Do you think you could eat all of them?
rows.annotation_3: Think of the largest number you can. Does she have more berries than that number?

annotation_1.eng: Violet is a very intense color. Is it too intense for you, or do you enjoy how intense it is?

annotation_2.eng: Now she has her arms crossed. Crossed arms can indicate being closed off from others.

annotation_3.eng: People tell us a lot without saying any words. Sometimes people do that with an expression on their face, and sometimes they do it with the way they hold their body.

rows.annotation_1: Violet is a very intense color. Is it too intense for you, or do you enjoy how intense it is?
rows.annotation_2: Now she has her arms crossed. Crossed arms can indicate being closed off from others.
rows.annotation_3: People tell us a lot without saying any words. Sometimes people do that with an expression on their face, and sometimes they do it with the way they hold their body.

rows.story_text: My dress is violet. Violet is my favorite color! What is your favorite color?

story_text.eng: My dress is violet. Violet is my favorite color! What is your favorite color?

annotation_1.eng: Notice that the flowers she is next to are violet flowers -- they are named after their color.

annotation_2.eng: She looks very happy wearing a dress with her favorite color. Do you have clothes that are in your favorite color?

annotation_3.eng: Which colors make you happy? Are there colors you don't like?

rows.annotation_1: Notice that the flowers she is next to are violet flowers -- they are named after their color.
rows.annotation_2: She looks very happy wearing a dress with her favorite color. Do you have clothes that are in your favorite color?
rows.annotation_3: Which colors make you happy? Are there colors you don't like?

rows.story_text: Do you know the seven colors of the rainbow?

story_text.eng: Do you know the seven colors of the rainbow?

annotation_1.eng: Can you remember what each color is?

annotation_2.eng: Some people use the fake name Roy G. Biv to remind them of the order of the seven colors of the rainbow.

annotation_3.eng: Brown is not one of the main colors of the rainbow. Are there other colors you know that are not one of the seven?

rows.annotation_1: Can you remember what each color is?
rows.annotation_2: Some people use the fake name Roy G. Biv to remind them of the order of the seven colors of the rainbow.
rows.annotation_3: Brown is not one of the main colors of the rainbow. Are there other colors you know that are not one of the seven?
